title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item is different.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 2. Display the values in a dynamic text item. 3. Display the values in a data/text item. Compare the format of the datetime values displayed in both items.
